name: Hungry Hole (Fixel)
description:
THE GAME WAS MADE DURING THE 3 DAYS VERTEX GAME JAM. THE THEME WAS: "START SMALL"

WE START PLAYING AS THE SMALL BLACK HOLE. OUR OBJECTIVE IS TO GROW IT AS MUCH AS WE CAN. IN ORDER TO DO THIS, WE CATCH PLANETS WHICH ORBIT AROUND OUR BLACK HOLE. IF WE MISS 3 TIMES, WE LOSE.
